title: Bug in champ select.
body:
Dear Riot,
Today i was getting ready to have a game and i was in champ select when i scrolled over tahm to view his abilities and hid ultimate only has the picture displayed. no text no name no nothing. Havent tried other champions but i thought i might bring this up, even though only minor.
Thanks,
Wingedkeyboard

replies.body: In champ select hover over a champion in the pool of champs and it will bring up the loading screen splash for that champion aswell as the abilitys at the bottom of the screen.

Have you ever tried it before this? If you are doing what I think you are doing, you are doing it wrong.

To view the skills you must go to the section with the videos, this will give a description AND a video to view, I currently do not know any other way to view the skills when you are in champ select other than this.
